VB
with
OBJ

VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To feed a baby or an animal
pomeni dati hrano otroku ali živali.

seg.quote: She fed the baby some milk.
What time is his next feed?

sense.def:
Kadar žival ali dojenček
feeds
, nekaj jé.

seg.quote: Not all bats feed on insects.

sense.def:
Feed
je hrana, ki jo damo živali.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To feed one's family or a community
pomeni dobaviti ali pripraviti hrano za družino ali družbo.

seg.quote: The farmers grew too little to feed even their own families.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
feeds on something
ali kadar je nekaj
fed by something
, tisto postaja močnejše.

seg.quote: The fires were being fed by escaping gas.

sense.def:
To feed something into a container, store, or other object
pomeni postopoma vstaviti nekaj v posodo, shrambo ali kam drugam.

seg.quote: This data is fed into the computer.
